titles: The co[n]futacyon of Tyndales answere made by syr Thomas More knyght lorde chau[n]cellour of Englonde
author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.
Tyndale, William, d. 1536. Answere unto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge.
notes: A reprinting of and reply to: Tyndale, William.  An answere unto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge.
A second part was published in 1533.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Tyndale, William, d. 1536. --  Answere unto Sir Thomas Mores dialoge --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Protestantism --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
